scripts.dev: npm run dev:kill && concurrently --kill-others "npm run dev:server:log" "npm run dev:web:log"
scripts.dev:server:log: npm run dev:kill:3001 && node scripts/spawn-log.js tmp/server.log npm run dev:server
scripts.dev:web:log: npm run dev:kill:3000 && node scripts/spawn-log.js tmp/web.log npm run dev:web
scripts.typecheck: cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--max-old-space-size=4096 tsc --noEmit --project apps/server/tsconfig.json && cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--max-old-space-size=4096 tsc --noEmit --project apps/web/tsconfig.json
scripts.validate: npm run lint && npm run typecheck && npm run knip
